channel.title: Comments on: Happy Weekend: Karneval der Kultur(en), Carnival of Culture(s)?
channel.description: See Berlin through a lens of migration and difference

item.title: By: Beyond Berlin: Difference on the Blessed Isle | Collidoscope Berlin
item.dc:creator: Beyond Berlin: Difference on the Blessed Isle | Collidoscope Berlin
item.description: […] effort to protest generalizing abroad. Otherwise my mind would have continued to host its very own Karneval der Kulturen, watching a parade of one-toned diversity go by and glossing over the […]
